creator: Filip.Jirsak@email.cz
text:
<VirtualHost 192.168.1.1:80>
  RewriteEngine Off
  RewriteRule  ^/            http://192.168.1.2/  [R,L]
  Include conf/mail.conf
</VirtualHost>

With this configuration (see RewriteEngine Off) browser is still redirected to
192.168.1.2 - rewrite engine is On.

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
No problem here. What is inside the mail.conf? Are there other directives
related to mod_rewrite somewhere?

(Did you restart the server after making your changes?)

I'm sorry, there was other RewriteEngine On in mail.conf and I thought
RewriteEngine works "do this until I see something else". Now it works OK.
creator: Filip.Jirsak@email.cz
nd@perlig.de
text: Ah fine. Thanks for your feedback.
